pci_notebook_add_attach_container_descri: If necessary, you can attach OVHcloud Object Storage containers or a Git repository to your notebook. Once they are attached, they will be temporarily loaded and cached near your instance, to minimise latency and improve performance. A best practice is to attach one container with your incoming data, and another with your outgoing data.
pci_notebook_add_attach_container_data_p: Only objects matching the prefix are uploaded to the file system
pci_notebook_add_attach_container_permis: In ‘Read Only’ mode, no sync is launched at the end of the job. This way, the job finishes quicker.
pci_notebook_add_attach_container_data_c: Cached containers can be reused by other jobs without additional syncing. Containers are removed from the cache after a period of inactivity.
